scheduledBlogs.title: NEAR Chain Abstraction Explained
scheduledBlogs.brief: Web3 gives users more control over their data and payments. Still, we pay for these benefits with increased technical and UX complexity. In recent years, blockchain ecosystems have tried to improve onboarding to get a hold of the UX part, but as many...
